text: Catathyridium lorentzii is a species of sole in the family Achiridae. It was described by Hendrik Weyenbergh in 1877, originally under the genus Achirus. It inhabits the Uruguay and Paraguay rivers. It reaches a maximum length of . ==References== Category:Pleuronectiformes Category:Fish described in 1877
title: Catathyridium lorentzii
